mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_menu (menu_code, menu_name, route, comment, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version) values ( #{menuCode}, #{menuName}, #{route}, #{comment}, 0, #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update t_sys_menu set menu_name = #{menuName}, route = #{route}, comment = #{comment}, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and menu_code = #{menuCode} and version = #{version}
update t_sys_menu set is_delete = 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_delete = 0 and menu_code = #{menuCode}
mapper.select: select menu_code menuCode, menu_name menuName, route, comment, version from t_sys_menu where is_delete = 0 and menu_code = #{menuCode}
select menu_code, menu_name, route, comment, version from t_sys_menu where is_delete = 0

select menu_code, menu_name from t_sys_menu where is_delete = 0
and (menu_name = '订单管理' or menu_name = '商品管理')
and menu_name = ''
